attributes.action: Move the Sun Valley poultry factory out of Hereford to a more suitable location out of town.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to see the Sun Valley Poultry factory in Hereford moved out of town to a more suitable location such as Moreton On-Lugg.

The main reasons for this is that the factory gives off a very unpleaseant smell which is especially bad in the summer. At the moment it is just too near a residential area and it is not fair on them to be so near the factory.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
